Name: Gooseberry
Description: A large round berry that makes for tasty pies.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una baya grande y redonda, se usa para preparar sabrosos pasteles.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 맛있는 파이를 만드는 매우 큰 베리
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine große Runde Beere, ein sehr leckerer Belag für Kuchen.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: おいしいパイが作れる丸くて大きなベリー。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma grande baga redonda que dá sabor a tortas.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种大的圆形浆果，用来做美味的馅饼。
